message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.DL 

This paper is about crosslingual word embeddings, which is a topic related to natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses an EM-style training algorithm, which is a machine learning technique, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely category. Additionally, the paper addresses the issue of polysemy, which is a common problem in NLP, suggesting cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) as another possible category. The paper also evaluates its model on monolingual word similarity and cross-lingual document classification tasks, which are related to information retrieval (IR) and deep learning (DL), respectively, making cs.IR and cs.DL possible categories as well.
